content: using many traditional-style winter motifs this cowl is a quick and easy knit for yourself or for a loved one for one repeat each of chart 1 and chart 2 this sample used approximately 67g 155yds of the main color and 27g 63yds of the contrast color adding additional length or chart repeats will affect the amount of yarn used **colorwork tip ** when the chart calls for any more than 5-6 stitches in between alternating colors it s best practice to catch your floats for instance if you are knitting 9 stitches in the main color before knitting with the contrast color in a single row you should try to catch the contrast color in the back on the 5th main color stitch need help with this technique here s a great tutorial on how to catch floats 1 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=bd7arufsuvg
